name: buff-to-uint-le
description: Converts a byte buffer to an unsigned integer use a little-endian encoding.. The byte buffer can be up to 16 bytes in length. If there are fewer than 16 bytes, as this function uses a little-endian encoding, the input behaves as if it is zero-padded on the <u>right</u>.
Note: This function is only available starting with Stacks 2.1.
